evidence.text: 1 | 2025-05-15 | Complaint. Filing fee in the amount of $405 collected. Agency Tracking ID: AORDC-9849714 Filer is subject to the requirements of Fed. R. Civ. P. 7.1. Jury Trial Requested: No. Filed b...

extracted.value: Complaint filed by Federation of State Humanities Councils, Oregon Council for the Humanities against all defendants on May 15, 2025. The complaint requested no jury trial and outlined the parties and allegations.

evidence.text: 6 | 2025-06-11 | Amended Complaint for Injunction and Declaratory Relief. Filed by Federation of State Humanities

extracted.value: Amended Complaint for Injunctive and Declaratory Relief filed by Federation of State Humanities on June 11, 2025.

evidence.text: 7 | 2025-06-25 | Motion for Preliminary Injunction . Oral Argument requested. Filed by All Plaintiffs.

extracted.value: Motion for Preliminary Injunction filed by All Plaintiffs on June 25, 2025, requesting a preliminary injunction and oral argument.

evidence.text: 21 | 2025-06-25 | Supplement Unopposed [Proposed] Briefing Schedule for Plaintiffs' Motion for Stay and Preliminary Injunction. Filed by All Plaintiffs. (Related document(s): Motion for Preliminary In...

22 | 2025-06-26 | SCHEDULING ORDER - The Court ADOPTS Plaintiffs' unopposed briefing schedule (ECF 21 ) as follows: Defendants' response to Plaintiffs' Motion for Stay and Preliminary Injunction (ECF 7 ) is due not later than Tuesday, July 15, 2025; Plaintiffs' reply is due not later than Wednesday, July 30, 2025; and the Court sets oral argument for Monday, August 4, 2025, at 9:00 a.m. in Portland, Courtroom 15B, before Judge Michael H. Simon.

extracted.value: Motion for Stay and Preliminary Injunction filed by All Plaintiffs on June 25, 2025. The filing requested a stay of the case, a preliminary injunction to halt the defendants’ actions, and requested oral argument before the court.

evidence.text: 24 | 2025-07-02 | Motion for Leave to Appear and File an Amicus Curiae Brief. Filed by State of Oregon, State of Maryland, State of Washington, State of Arizona, State of Colorado, State of Connecticut, State of Delaware, State of Hawaii, State of Maine, State of Michigan, State of Nevada, State of New Mexico, State of Rhode Island, State of Wisconsin, State of Vermont, District of Columbia. (Attachments: # 1 Exhibit 1) (Howell, Coby) (Entered: 07/02/2025)

extracted.value: Motion for Leave to Appear and File an Amicus Curiae Brief filed by State of Oregon, State of Maryland, State of Washington, State of Arizona, State of Colorado, State of Connecticut, State of Delaware, State of Hawaii, State of Maine, State of Michigan, State of Nevada, State of New Mexico, State of Rhode Island, State of Wisconsin, State of Vermont, and District of Columbia on July 2, 2025. The filing requested the court to allow the amicus states to appear and file a brief in support of the plaintiffs’ preliminary injunction.

evidence.text: 29 | 2025-07-15 | Unopposed Motion for Extension of Time to Answer Amended Complaint, 6 . Filed by All Defendants. (Martin, Sean) (Entered: 07/15/2025)

extracted.value: Unopposed Motion for Extension of Time to Answer Amended Complaint filed by All Defendants on July 15, 2025. The filing asked the court to grant additional time to answer the amended complaint.
